question: The bill to amend the constitution has to be introduced & passed in which of the following houses before presenting it to President for assent?
option1: Introduced and passed in Both Lok Sabha & Rajya Sabha
option4: Introduced in both houses but can be Passed in Lok Sabha only
answer: Introduced and passed in Both Lok Sabha & Rajya Sabha
explanation: The bill to amend the constitution has to be introduced & passed by Lok Sabha & Rajya Sabha separately, after which it is presented to the president.
